text: The Louyat Cemetery is the municipal cemetery of Limoges. Wrongly presented as being one of the largest in Europe, this cemetery is nevertheless one of the largest in France. Opened in 1806, it is the main cemetery of the municipality of Limoges (which has two other small cemeteries, that of Landouge and that of Beaune-les-Mines). == References == Category:1806 establishments in Europe Category:Cemeteries
title: Cemetery Louyat
